AboutPage.title: À propos
AboutPage.subtitle: À propos de moi
AboutPage.description: I'm a full-stack developer that loves building products and web apps that can impact millions of lives. I'm currently working on a few projects that I'm really excited about. I'm always looking for new opportunities to work on projects that can make a difference in the world.
